snippet: FEIN--Adele Polansky, on Sunday, January 31, 2016, of Rockville, MD. Beloved wife of Elliott; devoted mother of Elaine and Aaron (Melissa); loving sister of Leon (Evelyn) Polansky and loving grandmother of Abra and Mira. Funeral service to be determined. 1/3
lead_paragraph: FEIN--Adele Polansky, on Sunday, January 31, 2016, of Rockville, MD. Beloved wife of Elliott; devoted mother of Elaine and Aaron (Melissa); loving sister of Leon (Evelyn) Polansky and loving grandmother of Abra and Mira. Funeral service to be determined. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FEIN, ADELE POLANSKY
